ValueSet-IMMZD2DTMalariaVS.title: IMMZD2DTMalaria ValueSet for Decision Table Schema
ValueSet-IMMZD2DTMalariaVS.description: JSON Schema for IMMZD2DTMalaria ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
enum: http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Client is not due for malaria vaccination-48
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#No malaria primary series doses were administered-116
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Client's age is more than or equal to 5 months-41
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#One malaria primary series dose was administered-116
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#The latest malaria dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago-99
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#The latest malaria dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago-106
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Two malaria primary series doses were administered-116
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Three malaria primary series doses were administered-116
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Four malaria primary series doses were administered-116
ValueSet-IMMZD2DTMalariaVS.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZD2DTMalaria ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZD2DTMalariaVS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
